Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine

Interface Initializable

All Known Subinterfaces:
YaegerScene
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicScene, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, EntityCollection, EntityMotionInitBuffer, RectangleEntity, SceneCollection, ShapeEntity, SplashScene, SpriteEntity, StaticScene, TextEntity, YaegerEntity, YaegerStage
public interface Initializable
Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the init lifecycle hook.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void afterInit()
    A default method to be used as a lifecycle hook to be called after initialization has been done.
    void init​(com.google.inject.Injector injector)  

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init​(com.google.inject.Injector injector)
      Parameters:
      injector - the Injector used for Dependency Injection

    • afterInit

      default void afterInit()
      A default method to be used as a lifecycle hook to be called after initialization has been done. By default
